metadata.title: How to Choose a YouTube Niche 2025: Find Your Perfect Topic
metadata.description: Pick the right YouTube niche for your channel. Balance passion, demand, and competition.

hero.headline: How to Choose Your YouTube Niche
hero.subheadline: Find your perfect topic. Where passion meets opportunity.

sections.content: Niche selection determines your growth trajectory. Too broad and you compete with everyone. Too narrow and there's no audience. The sweet spot balances your interests, audience demand, and achievable competition. Here's how to find it.

content.title: Passion/Knowledge
content.description: Can you make 100+ videos on this? Interest sustains long-term.

content.title: Audience Size
content.description: Enough people interested? Too small = limited growth ceiling.

content.title: Competition Level
content.description: Can you compete? Saturated niches need differentiation.

sections.title: Niche Selection Process
content: List topics you know well and enjoy
Research audience demand (search volume, existing channels)

content.title: Monetizable
content.description: Sponsors exist, products to promote. RPM matters.

content.title: Evergreen Potential
content.description: Content stays relevant. Not just trending moments.

content.title: Depth
content.description: Hundreds of video ideas possible. Not exhausted quickly.

faq.question: Can I change niches later?
faq.answer: Yes, but it's hard. Existing audience may leave. Better to sub-niche or expand gradually. Choose wisely upfront.

faq.question: How specific should my niche be?
faq.answer: Specific enough to stand out, broad enough to sustain content. 'Tech reviews' is too broad. 'Budget Android phones' is better.

faq.question: What niches make most money?
faq.answer: Finance, business, tech, health have high CPMs. But competition is fierce. Balance earning potential with achievability.

faq.question: Should I follow passion or profit?
faq.answer: Both matter. Passion sustains you through hard times. Profit validates demand. Find overlap.
